name: Bird Mystifier
description:
BirdMystifier is a VR Game, running on windows 10 

Did you know that 2.5 Millions years ago, birds were the dominant species? 

Well it's been a while since then, but they are back and will soon take over the world!
Humankind is in danger ! 
You must prove  those stupid birds our superiority!

What better than to impress them with a magic trick ?

Each bird has a favorite color, mystify them by making accordingly colored roses appear in the empty hat!
Nothing's easier than soaking a flower in paint and hop, in the hat!

But watch out! They are not easily fooled! If we want this to work, flowers have to appear as if by magic, they must not see anything !

Creates a diversion by waving the champagne bottle, the fruit or the book, in front of their big becks.
Green points show the trajectory of the object to keep them distract

Once you have put the right flowers in the hat, grab the wand, and smash the hat yelling the spell "sligiplloup" ! 

That will MYSTIFY them for sure!

Watch out, birds are stubborn so an unsatisfied one will stay unsatisfied.

Good luck, faith of humanity is in your hands!!

----- The Project has been tested with an oculus quest 2 using oculus link on a ryzen 2700X with RTX 2070Super ----
